survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Electric Vehicle (EV) Charging Network Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from electric vehicle owners about their experiences with public EV charging networks, including ease of use, reliability, and satisfaction with charging speeds.

questions.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clear data collection.

script.question_text: How often do you use public EV charging stations?

questions.question_text: Which of the following charging networks have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use multi-choice checkboxes for this question to allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with an open-text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: Which of the following charging networks have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for this question to measure satisfaction levels accurately.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of public EV charging stations in your area?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using public EV charging stations?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed responses about challenges faced.

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when using public EV charging stations?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1

questions.question_text: Would you recommend your preferred charging network to other EV owners?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to gauge likelihood of recommendation.

script.question_text: Would you recommend your preferred charging network to other EV owners?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'A few times a year' in Q1
